name: Spectra Arcana
description:
Read the cards. Examine yourself through a queer lens. Question your identity and learn.

This game combines themes of tarot and queerness. It is closely based on LGBTQ+ experiences and aims to provide a constructive method of self-analysis in queer contexts.

This is my final year project for a BA(Hons) Games Art & Design course at the Norwich University of the Arts. It was developed over the span of multiple months and involved interviewing multiple LGBTQ+ people for its production.
